stance_1: I am trying to cut out processed meats
stance_2: I think processed meats are harmful
justification: The interviewee explicitly states that they are trying to cut out processed meats because they believe they are more harmful.

stance_1: I am trying to cut out red meats
stance_2: I want to improve my health
justification: The interviewee explicitly connects their effort to cut out red meats with the desire to improve health and blood work.

stance_1: I am trying to cut out processed meats
stance_2: I want to improve my health
justification: Trying to cut out processed meats is directly linked to the goal of improving health, as stated by the interviewee.

stance_1: I eat meat in most meals
stance_2: I am trying to cut out red meats
justification: The interviewee continues to eat meat in most meals while trying to reduce red meat, indicating a conflict between current behavior and desired reduction.

stance_1: I eat meat in most meals
stance_2: I am trying to cut out processed meats
justification: Eating meat in most meals, some of which are processed, conflicts with the intention to cut processed meats.

stance_1: I eat meat in most meals
stance_2: Most people I know eat all kinds of meat
justification: The interviewee's eating pattern aligns with the observed norm in their social circle of eating all kinds of meat.

stance_1: I am trying to cut out red meats
stance_2: Most people I know eat all kinds of meat
justification: The interviewee's attempt to reduce red meat contrasts with the behavior of most people they know, who eat all kinds of meat.

stance_1: I am trying to cut out processed meats
stance_2: Most people I know eat all kinds of meat
justification: The interviewee's effort to cut out processed meats is at odds with the norm of most people they know eating all types of meat, including processed.

stance_1: I think processed meats are harmful
stance_2: Most people I know eat all kinds of meat
justification: Believing processed meats are harmful subtly conflicts with the observation that most people eat all kinds, including processed meats.
